_comment_preferredTableTypes: Optional: Filter by table type. Common values: 'Table', 'Bar Seats', 'Patio', 'Counter'. Leave empty or omit to accept any type.
_comment_scheduledStartTime: Optional: Schedule when to start the script. Formats: '18:00' (time only), '2026-01-15 18:00' (full datetime), or '2026-01-15T18:00:00' (ISO 8601). Can be overridden with --start-at CLI option.
